message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.  I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Alice, $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product but my budget is $12,000. Would you be willing to go lower?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is closer to my bottom line.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $16,000 is still a little high for me.  I'm willing to go to $14,000.  What do you think?
